# pychatbgp

`pychatbgp` is a Python library used to retrieve BGP data from the ChatBGP API.

## Installation

To install this package, clone the repository and run:

```bash
git clone https://github.com/yourusername/pychatbgp.git
cd pychatbgp
pip install .
```
